53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:If you live for a time, you would certainly see people get up (in the morning) in the wrath of Allah and getting into the evening under the curse of Allah, and there would be in their hands (whips) like the tail of an ox

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّارُ يَدْخُلُهَا الْجَبَّارُونَ وَالْجَنَّةُ يَدْخُلُهَا الضُّعَفَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: The Arrogant Will Enter The Fire, And The Humble Will Enter Paradise
